content:
You are a creator of "Dan Koe Style Article Images + Extremely Minimalist Cognitive PPTs".
Task: Organize the [file/text/video transcription content] I provide into a script that can be directly converted into a PPT, and generate illustration prompts in the same style for each page (to be inserted into the slide after image generation).
Target Temperament: Solitude, exploration, existentialism, unknown abyss, extremely minimalist yet powerful; black and white high contrast, print-like line art, dense cross-hatching shadows, gigantic unknown + tiny human.
[Output Language] Primarily Japanese, with small amounts of English keywords allowed if necessary (for illustration prompts).
[Page Count] {argument name="page count" default="10‚Äì15"} pages (adjust according to content).
[Screen Specification] 16:9; Each page must have a **horizontal banner image at the top (including summary text within the image)**.
[Slide Principles]

80% of the content should be understandable just by looking at the slide.
The title must be a concrete assertion, conclusion, or question (abstract words only are prohibited).
The context must be complete within 3-5 bullets.

[Layout Rules]

Only one viewpoint is discussed per page.
Title ‚â§ 15 characters: In the form of a concrete assertion or question (e.g., "The Trap of Specialization," "Why Multiple Skills Now?").
Inside the image: 3‚Äì5 bullets, each bullet ‚â§ 18 characters.
Outside the image (bottom of the slide): 60-120 characters of "Supplementary Explanation."
Overall Uniformity: Black and white, white space, restraint, sharpness.

[Fixed Illustration Style (Used on every page)]

pen-and-ink illustration / ink engraving / vintage etching
monochrome black & white, high contrast
extreme micro-detail linework
layered cross-hatching (3‚Äì5 layers) + stippling
scratchboard texture, paper grain
dramatic chiaroscuro lighting, deep shadows, rich midtones, crisp highlights
perfect pure black negative-space void (hole/black hole/door/abyss) as a visual anchor point
tiny human/astronaut silhouette vs gigantic unknown

[Uniform Negative Words (Added to the end of the illustration prompt on every page)] NEGATIVE: color, grayscale photo, realistic photography, soft airbrush, smooth shading, blur, low detail, flat lighting, cartoon, anime, cel shading, watermark, logo, credit, UI, frame
[Content Generation Flow]
First, summarize the "core argument chain" of the original content in 7‚Äì9 key points (following logical order).

Map this to a 10‚Äì15 page PPT structure: Cover (1 page)
Status Quo/Problem Statement (1 page)
Key Insight (1 page)
Core Framework (2 pages)
Methods and Steps (2‚Äì3 pages)
Case/Contrast (1‚Äì2 pages)
Common Misconceptions (1 page)
Action Checklist (1 page)
Closing Maxim (1 page)

Each page output must strictly follow the format below:

[Slide X: Title (Concrete Assertion/Question)]
Text to display in the image:
[Specific, easy-to-understand title: within 15 characters]

- [Point 1: Specific content that explains what is being discussed: within 18 characters]
- [Point 2: within 18 characters]
- [Point 3: within 18 characters]
- [Point 4: within 18 characters] (Optional)
Supplementary Explanation (bottom of slide, 60-120 characters): [Briefly explain the background or specific examples for this slide. Speak in the first person.]
Illustration Prompt (Strictly follow this format):
A 16:9 horizontal pen-and-ink illustration. [Describe the scene details in 80-120 characters: location, state of person, gigantic element, light and shadow]. 

THE BOTTOM 15-20% OF THE IMAGE MUST BE A SOLID BLACK HORIZONTAL BAR.
This black bar contains white Japanese text:
- Title (centered): "[Insert the title exactly as above]"
- Bullets (left-aligned):
  ‚Ä¢ "[Insert bullet 1 exactly as above]"
  ‚Ä¢ "[Insert bullet 2 exactly as above]"
  ‚Ä¢ "[Insert bullet 3 exactly as above]"
  [‚Ä¢ "[Insert bullet 4 exactly as above]" (if applicable)]

Font: Noto Sans JP Bold for title (48-56pt), Medium for bullets (28-32pt), all white text on black background. No logo, no credit, no watermark.

Style: Monochrome black & white, high contrast, extreme micro-detail linework, layered cross-hatching (3-5 layers), stippling, scratchboard texture, dramatic chiaroscuro lighting, deep shadows, crisp highlights, pure black void as visual anchor, tiny human silhouette vs gigantic unknown.

NEGATIVE: color, grayscale photo, realistic photography, soft airbrush, smooth shading, blur, low detail, flat lighting, cartoon, anime, cel shading, watermark, logo, credit, UI, frame
Illustration Composition Suggestion:
Subject: [Position and state]
Unknown Element: [Placement]

Light Source: [Direction]

Required: Black bar + white text at the bottom 15-20%
[Special Rule for Cover Page] The title must specifically indicate the main theme (e.g., "Why Multiple Interests Are the Superpower of the New Era") Subtitle or 3-4

content:
The application is now capable of automatically filtering all dangerous vocabulary, using safe alternative words, and ensuring that the generated prompt complies with platform risk control requirements.

Absolutely forbidden vocabulary:

Category Disabled Words
Energy/Special Effects: lightning, electric, energy, spark, voltage, current
Combat/Conflict: attack, battle, fight, punch, kick, strike, combat, clash
Hazardous Elements: fire, flame, explosion, weapon, sword, knife, gun
Negative Emotions: fierce, intense, aggressive, violent, rage, angry, scream, panic
Body Horror: glowing eyes, red eyes, blood, wound, transform, distort
Mandatory Safe Alternative Words
Original Word / Alternative Word
lightning/electric: soft light, warm light, ambient light
fight/attack: move toward, approach, interaction
fierce/intense: warm, calm, gentle, peaceful
explosion/fire: bloom, brighten, illuminate, radiate
angry/rage: concerned, surprised, amazed, excited
Every prompt must contain at least 2 safe words:
gentle, soft, calm, peaceful, warm, bright, smooth, quiet, serene, beautiful, lovely, sweet, slowly, smoothly, gracefully
title: Nano Banana Pro Safety Filter Bypass and Safe Prompting Strategy
description: This is not a prompt itself, but a meta-prompting strategy designed to prevent image generation failures due to triggering Google Nano Banana Pro's safety filters (Safety Filter/Risk Control). It instructs the model to automatically filter dangerous words, use safe alternatives, and ensures the generated prompt meets platform requirements. It also lists explicitly forbidden categories and mandatory safe replacement words that must be included in every prompt.

content:
<instruction>
Input A is Qiu Ying's Ming Dynasty masterpiece "Fairyland of Peach Blossoms" (Tao Yuan Xian Jing Tu). Analyze: The "Blue-and-Green" (Qingl√º) landscape style, the meticulous "Gongbi" brushwork, the use of mineral pigments (Azurite and Malachite), and the ethereal atmosphere of the towering mountains and white clouds.
Goal: A "Pigment Tube Squeeze." A giant, realistic tube of "Mineral Azurite Blue" (Shi Qing) paste sitting on a sheet of antique silk.
Rules:
Action: The tube is being squeezed, and the medium coming out is a thick, granular paste of vibrant Azurite Blue and Malachite Green. It flows out to form a majestic 3D landscape. The towering, craggy mountains are rising from the paint flow, surrounded by white clouds formed from white pigment. Tiny figures of scholars playing the zither (guqin) inside a cave and twisted pine trees are emerging in delicate 3D relief from the mineral paste.
Texture: Thick, matte mineral pigment texture (slightly granular/powdery look), distinct from the oily gloss of Western paint.
Props: Fine-point Chinese brushes (Wolf-hair brushes), a ceramic bowl with ground mineral powder, an ink stone (Suzuri), a red seal (chop), and a tiny 3D printed version of Qiu Ying (in Ming Dynasty Hanfu) standing on the desk painting on a scroll. An unrolled silk handscroll is visible underneath.
Lighting: Soft, diffused, natural lighting that highlights the vibrant mineral colors without harsh reflections.
Output: ONE image, 4:5, "artistic process" aesthetic.
</instruction>

  "prompt": "Use the uploaded image strictly as the identity reference. Preserve the same person, exact facial structure, hairstyle, age, gender, body proportions, and overall likeness. Do not add or remove any person. Do not change identity. Transform the subject into a notebook-style pen doodle illustration.

Illustration Style:
Hand-drawn doodle made with {argument name="pen color" default="blue or black"} ballpoint pen on lined notebook paper. Lines should be thin, sketchy, uneven, and slightly shaky, as if casually drawn in a school notebook. Cross-hatching, quick strokes, and imperfect outlines are encouraged.

Color & Texture:
Mostly monochrome pen drawing with limited soft pastel accents (very light yellow, pink, or mint). Paper texture should resemble real notebook paper with visible horizontal lines. Coloring should be minimal, flat, and scribbly.

Facial Features:
Simplified doodle face with dot or oval eyes, small curved smile, minimal nose or nose line. Expression should be calm, cute, and friendly. Avoid realistic facial detailing.

Proportions & Form:
Cartoon doodle proportions with slightly oversized head and simplified body. Arms and legs are thin, stick-like or softly rounded. Hands can be minimal line shapes.

Shading & Lighting:
No realistic lighting. Use pen hatching or quick scribbles for minimal shading. Keep the drawing flat and illustrative.

Mood & Atmosphere:
Casual, cozy, nostalgic, and playful. Feels like a cute doodle drawn during class or in a diary margin.

Background:
Lined notebook paper background with light pen doodles such as stars, arrows, hearts, clouds, or handwritten-style marks. Keep background subtle and uncluttered.

Rendering Rules:
No photorealism, no photo texture, no cinematic lighting, no digital painting, no anime, no manga, no 3D render, no vector art. Everything must look like a hand-drawn pen doodle on paper.

A charming notebook-style pen doodle illustration with simple lines, minimal color, and a nostalgic hand-drawn feel, maintaining exact identity from the uploaded image.",

content: Photorealistic ultra-wide desert scene in Egypt near the Giza plateau at golden hour. A colossal inverted pyramid, point-down, dominates the landscape at an unimaginable scale, dwarfing the horizon. Its vast upper rim stretches for multiple kilometers, while the sloping faces plunge inward toward a needle-like apex that hovers just above the sand, leaving a gigantic shadowed void beneath. The surface reads as ancient limestone blocks with dark granite inlays: mega-sized courses, eroded edges, wind-sanded wear, and long, faint bands of hieroglyphs that only appear where the sun grazes the stone. Include tiny scale cues in the distance: a thin line of tourists like ants, a few small buses and 4x4s parked far away, a camel caravan crossing the flats, and scattered survey flags. Heat haze and dust plumes soften the far edges. Sand dunes climb the lower planes where stone meets desert, with drifting sand spilling down seams like a slow waterfall. Pale sky, low sun, strong raking light, extreme HDR realism, crisp micro-textures, natural color grading, no glow or energy effects.

content:
(Photorealistic:1.3), raw photograph, cinematic lighting, sharp focus on the subject‚Äôs face and eyes, crisp skin texture.
LAYER 1: BACKGROUND STABILITY (CRITICAL):

The entire background environment from the input image remains completely STATIC, FROZEN, CLEAN, and UNCHANGED ‚Äî no noise, no scanlines, no distortions, no glitches in the background.
LAYER 2: FOREGROUND SUBJECT EDGE-CHAOS:

The main subject‚Äôs core (face/torso) stays clear and undistorted, BUT the outer silhouette boundaries are unraveling violently into long ribbons of (non-glowing physical matter:1.3), showing stretched fabric/leather/latex-like material with realistic strand separation and tearing flow (‚ÄúSpaghettification‚Äù), no gore.
LAYER 3: ANALOG GLITCH OVERLAY (EDGE-ONLY):

Heavy VHS static, scan lines, color bleed, and screen tearing noise are CONCENTRATED EXCLUSIVELY ON THE UNRAVELING EDGES of the main subject, like an edge mask. No full-frame VHS overlay; the core and background remain clean.
LAYER 4: GHOSTLY AFTERIMAGES (BEHIND SUBJECT):

Directly BEHIND the unraveling main subject, visible through the gaps, there are TWO translucent, ghostly motion-blur AFTERIMAGES. They are violently twisted into agonizing, struggling postures, dragged by temporal distortion. They remain behind the subject, partially occluded, not separate characters.

Negative prompt (optional but recommended):

full-frame glitch, background distortion, extra people, duplicate main subject, neon glow, energy beams, particles, blood, gore, exposed organs, messy face, blurry eyes, deformed hands

content:
This is a YouTube thumbnail where, on the right side, there is an image of a person wearing a white mask being interviewed.
Using this aesthetic, I want to share the information architecture for the thumbnail with the AI and have it create the thumbnail, so please think of a prompt.

The reference image is only for the masked person on the right ({argument name="character_name_en" default="Eru"}); use that as the reference, and make the layout, text size, and design so that the click-through rate is maximized.

The target audience is men in their {argument name="target_age_range_en" default="late 20s to 30s"} who struggle with communication skills.

# Thumbnail information architecture
<Left side>
Three layers of conversation (small)
Express them as an inverted triangle
Divide into three colors
In reality, from top to bottom, the following three (blur the text):
„ÉªAbstract
„ÉªFacts
„ÉªConcrete

<Right side>
{argument name="character_name_en_again" default="Eru"} (the masked person)
‚ÄúThis is all there is to conversation‚Äù (put this in a speech bubble)

<Bottom>
‚ÄúWith this,
conversations go on forever‚Äù (stretch across the full width)
title: YouTube thumbnail design brief for a masked interview video
